nodes.text: The Reena Minor system was located in the Bothan sector, a part of the Slice portion of the Mid Rim. It shared its name with the hyperlane known as the Reena Trade Route as well as the world of Reena in the Colonies' Reena system.
The Reena Minor system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square R-14.
